column1: #Text=The managing director should ensure that the board of directors receives such objective, detailed and relevant information as required in order to take well-founded decisions and that the board of directors is regularly informed regarding developments in the undertaking's operations.
#Text=An undertaking should possess efficient information and communications systems for the dissemination of internal information.
#Text=The reference here is, inter alia, to technical systems as well as organisation and routines for the internal communication and dissemination of information.
